Recipe.Title: Chicken Marsala

Ingredient.Name: 8 chicken breasts; skinless, deboned, pounded thin

Recipe.Instructions: Season chicken with salt and pepper and coat lightly with flour. Heat 1 T olive oil and butter over medium-high heat and cook chicken until both sides are lightly browned, approx. 3-4 minutes, set aside on plate. Add the other tablespoon of olive oil and sauté garlic until softened. Add mushrooms, salt and pepper and sauté until tender, approx. 3 minutes. Add marsala to deglaze pan and simmer a few minutes as it reduces. Return chicken to pan and cook until heated through; add one tablespoon of butter into sauce.
